entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers except a few wet flurries over higher terrain this morning. Snow level 800 metres rising to 1100 metres this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating late this morning. High plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Snow level 1100 metres. Fog patches developing near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 16 January 2023
